## SavedObjectsFieldMapping type

Describe a [saved object type mapping](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectstypemappingdefinition.md) field.

Please refer to [opensearch documentation](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/opensearch/reference/current/mapping-types.html) For the mapping documentation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SavedObjectsFieldMapping = SavedObjectsCoreFieldMapping | SavedObjectsComplexFieldMapping;
```
